entry.title: Armenia and Russia exchange accusations over crisis in Artsakh

media:group.media:title: Armenia and Russia exchange accusations over crisis in Artsakh
media:group.media:description:
Azerbaijanโs seizure of the Lachin corridor, the only route linking Artsakh to the outside world, stretches into the 18th day. As this story is becoming repetitive, the shelves of shops and groceries in Artsakh are becoming more and more depleted. Authorities in Artsakh expressed willingness to let international experts into the Kashen mine to conduct environmental examinations. Azerbaijan claims that civilians are blocking the road for environmental reasons.

entry.title: What Can the Armenian Economy Expect in 2023?

media:group.media:description:
Economist and Associate Professor at the American University of Armenia, Aleksandr Grigoryan, sat down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to discuss Armeniaโs economic performance within wider regional developments and shocks.

entry.title: Karabakh Sees Worsening Food and Medical Supply Shortages

media:group.media:title: Karabakh Sees Worsening Food and Medical Supply Shortages
media:group.media:description:
Armeniaโs Human rights defender Kristine Grigoryan urged the UN Human Rights Commission to send a fact-finding mission to the Lachin corridor. The corridor, which is the inly road connecting Karabakh to Armenia has been closed by Azerbaijan for 17 days. The Hayastan All Armenian Fund convened an extraordinary Board Meeting on Tuesday to discuss the provision of humanitarian aid to Artsakh in the context of the corridor blockade. The Fundโs US affiliate expressed readiness to allocate 500 000 US dollars, to provide food products.

entry.title: Exporting from Armenia to the world: Thermorex leads the way

The Armenian company Thermorex has grown to become an industry leader in the production of bimetallic thermostats, specialized temperature-measuring devices with a wide range of applications in mechanical and electrical devices. media:group.media:title: ีีกีทีกึีดีกีถ 17-ึีค ึ ึีจ. ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีฐีธึีดีกีถีซีฟีกึ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีพีธึีด ีง

ิดีฅีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 28-ีจ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีบีกีทีกึีดีกีถ 17-ึีค ึ ึีถ ีงึ 17 ึ ึ ีง, ีซีถีน ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีซ ึีกีฏ ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีธีพ ีกีถีฐีถีกึ ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซึ ิฑึึีกีญ ีคีฅีฒีธึีกีตึ, ีฝีถีถีคีกีดีฉีฅึึ ึ ีพีกีผีฅีฌีซึ ีฐีกีฝึีถีฅีฌ: ิดีฅีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 25-ีซีถ ิฟีกึีดีซึ ีญีกีนีซ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีฏีธีดีซีฟีฅีซ ีดีซีปีถีธึีคีธึีฉีตีกีดีข 10 ีฟีธีถีถีก ีฐีธึีดีกีถีซีฟีกึ ีขีฅีผ ีง ีฐีกีฝึีพีฅีฌ ิฑึึีกีญ: ีีถีกีตีกีฎ ีคึีกีถี ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีฐีธึีดีกีถีซีฟีกึ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีพีธึีด ีง: ีีซึีฃ-ีขีกีถีปีกึีฅีฒีฅีถีซ ีญีกีถีธึีฉีถีฅึีจ ึีกีฏ ีฅีถ, ีดีตีธึีฝ ีญีกีถีธึีฉีถีฅึีธึีด ีธึีธีทีกีฏีซ ีกีบึีกีถึีถีฅึ ีฝีบีกีผีพีฅีฌ ีฅีถ:

media:group.media:title: ีีกึีฝีฏีฅึีฅีถีจ, ีฉีธึึึีฅึีฅีถีจ, ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีฅึีฅีถีจ ึ ีพึีกึีฅึีฅีถีจี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีคีบึีธึีถีฅึีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
2022-2023 ีธึีฝีธึีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีกึีธึีด ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีฌีฅีฆีธึีถีฅึีซ ีธึีฝีธึึีดีกีถ ีฎึีกีฃีซึีจ ีดีฅีฏีถีกึีฏีฅีฌ ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ 23 ีฐีกีถึีกีฏึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีฝีธึีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกีฝีฟีกีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีด, ีธึีธีถึีซึ 7-ีธึีดี ีบีกึีฝีฏีฅึีฅีถ, 3-ีธึีดี ีพึีกึีฅึีฅีถ, 9-ีธึีดี ีฉีธึึึีฅึีฅีถ, 4-ีธึีดี ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีฅึีฅีถ ีฅีถ ีคีกีฝีกีพีกีถีคีธึีด: ิฟึีฉีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟีถีฅึีจ ีดีกีฟีถีกีถีทีธึีด ีฅีถ ีบีซีฌีธีฟีกีตีซีถ ีกีตีฝ ีฎึีกีฃึีซ ีขีกึีฅึีจ:
*ีีฅีฝีกีถีตีธึีฉีจ ีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ิตีี ีนีธึึีธึีค ีฏีธึึีฝีซ ีธึีฝีกีถีธีฒีถีฅึ ีีฟีฅึีกีถีซ ีีฐีกีถีปีกีถีตีกีถีจ, ิฑีถีกีฐีซีฟ ีีกึีกีดีตีกีถีจ ึ ิฑึึีซีฏ ีีกึีฃีฝีตีกีถีจี ยซิบีธึีผีถีกีฌีซีฝีฟีซ ีพีกึีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป ีกีผีกึีฏีกีตีซ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีธึีดึ

media:group.media:description:
๐The blockade of Artsakh by Azerbaijan has entered its 16th day exacerbating the humanitarian situation of the 120 000 people who remain besieged in their homeland. ๐Armenia's security council chief decries Russia as Prime Minister attends a Russia-led summit in St. Petersburg. ๐Putin holds a tripartite meeting with Armeniaโs and Azerbaijanโs leaders in CIS informal summit in St. Petersburg. ๐Former Karabakh Army commander Samvel Babayan warns of a new regional war. ๐Following a Court ruling, Armeniaโs government provided CivilNet with the donation contract of its shares of Zangezur Copper-Molybdenum Combine.
